But as a liberal guy, I can't sit here and act like the roots of where we are now with misinformation weren't formed from shows I enjoyed, that again I feel were doing it in sincerity, and with the wrong people finding this route to disburse alternative news, has blossomed into this nightmare.

Comment: It was happening way before TDS. Rush Limbaugh, with his radio show and television show are what probably really started what we're seeing now. TDS was more an attempt of a response to that sort of stuff. I was fairly conservative in my youth and listened to a lot of talk radio and witnessed it going from 'people I kind of agree with' to 'these guys are nuts'. For example, early Limbaugh skewered a lot of conservatives, especially nanny state types who wanted to censor 'smutty media' and the like. This was when he had  a difficult time getting sponsors so came up with the fake stuff. Then he realized where his bread was buttered and dove in completely. And I'm not defending the guy; he was always a pompous asshat, but his transition from fairly middle of the road to extreme right-winger is kind of the precursor to what we're seeing now and opened the door for it.
